Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: First the task is to apply process mining techniques to infer activities from sensor readings The activities are like Cutting Metal Assembling Parts Welding Quality Inspection or Packaging

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The task involves using process mining to deduce activities from sensor data Activities include actions like Cutting Metal Assembling Parts Welding Quality Inspection and Packaging

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Need to group sensor events into phases using patterns in temperature pressure vibration material flow tool position and energy Will assign activity labels based on these patterns and provide rationale for each phase

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Events 1 3 show low readings temp 20 21C energy 0 40 0 50 kWh likely idle or startup phase

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Event 4 marks a shift with temp at 50C vibration at 30 Hz and energy at 2 00 kWh indicating activity start

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Events 5 6 suggest cutting or machining with temp 55 58C vibration 35 38 Hz and energy 2 50 3 00 kWh

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Event 7 8 show stable moderate readings temp 40C pressure 2 bar possibly a transition phase

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Event 9 with temp at 80C vibration at 50 Hz and energy at 5 00 kWh suggests welding due to high readings and no flow
